title: Summoner Level
body: Here on the League site, my summoner level is listed as Level 14, but I've been level 30 for about 5 months. Not that big of deal, but you have to be level 20 to post comments on threads. Can anyone help me out on resolving the issue? I searched the support section, but couldn't find anything.

replies.body: Looks like your profile just needed to update, and posting here did just that.  Happy posting!
